DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effects of mild and moderate impairment of hepatic function on the single-dose pharmacokinetics, safety and tolerability of AG-013736.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of Hepatic Impairment On AG-013736 Pharmacokinetics
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of reduced hepatic function (Child Pugh Classification A or B) Body Mass Index of 1832 kg/m2 History of febrile illness within 5 days prior to first dose Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption (e.g. gastrectomy) Positive urine drug screen
